[Setup]
AppName=WritersAdmin
AppVersion=1.0
DefaultDirName={pf}\WritersAdmin
DefaultGroupName=WritersAdmin
UninstallDisplayIcon={app}\selective.exe
OutputDir=Output

[Files]
Source: "dist\*"; DestDir: "{app}"

[Icons]
Name: "{group}\WritersAdmin"; Filename: "{app}\selective.exe"
Name: "{group}\Uninstall WritersAdmin"; Filename: "{uninstallexe}"

[UninstallDelete]
Type: files; Name: "{app}\*.*"
Type: filesandordirs; Name: "{app}\*"
